pages.text: 7|196|amara abhibhabaka to allah yini kitaba nayila karechena ebam tini'i satkarmaparayanadera abhibhabakatba kare thakena [1].
7|197|Ara allaha chara tomara yaderake daka tara to tomaderake sahayya karate pare na ebam tara tadera nijederake'o sahayya karate pare na.
7|198|Ara yadi apani taderake satpathe dakena tabe tara sunabe na [1] ebam apani dekhate pabena ye, tara apanara dike takiye ache; athaca tara dekhe na [2].
7|199|Manusera (caritra o karmera) utkrsta ansa grahana karuna, satkajera nirdesa dina ebam ajnaderake eriye caluna [1].
7|200|Ara yadi sayatanera kumantrana apanake prarocita kare, tabe allahara asraya ca'ibena. Niscaya tini sarbasrota, sarbajna [1].
7|201|Niscaya yara taka'oya abalambana karache, taderake sayatana yakhana kumantrana [1] deya takhana tara allahake sbarana kare ebam sathe sathe'i tadera cokha khule yaya [2].
7|202|Tadera sangi-sathira taderake bhulera dike tene neya. Tarapara e bisaye tara kono truti kare na [1].

7|203|Apani yakhana tadera kache (tadera ca'oya mata) kono ayata [1] niye asena na, takhana tara bale, ‘apani nije'i ekati ayata baniye nena na kena?’ Baluna, ‘amara rabera paksa theke ya amara kache ohi hisebe prerana kara haya, ami to sudhu tara'i anusarana kari. E kura'ana tomadera rabera paksa theke spasta pramana. Ara hidayata o rahamata emana sampradayera jan'ya yara imana ane [2].
7|204|Ara yakhana kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tomara manoyogera sathe ta suna ebam niscupa haye thaka yate tomadera prati daya kara haya [1].
7|205|Ara apani apanara rabake nija mane smarana karuna [1] sabinaye, sasankacitte o anuccasbare, sakale o sandhyaya. Ara udasinadera antarbhukta habena na.
7|206|Niscaya yara apanara rabera sannidhye rayeche tara tamra ibadatera byapare ahankara [1] kare na. Ara tara tamra'i tasabiha patha kare [2] ebam tamra'i jan'ya sajada [3] kare.
